attributes.action: To Stop petrol stations selling fuel at fractions of a penny
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Petrol stations currently sell fuel at point 9 ( .9 ) of a penny per liter.  Thus ripping off the motorist by millions each year.  They must be made to sell fuel only in full pence, or the value of the smallest coin available.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
